Container.Name: FDM Monster
Container.Overview:
3D printer farm management platform for local or in-cloud usage using OctoPrint.
Converted By Community Applications Always verify this template (and values) against the support page for the container
https://hub.docker.com/r/fdmmonster/fdm-monster/
Container.DonateText: The FDM Monster project can be backed through Github Sponsors.

Config.Name: Web UI
Config.Description: Port needed to access WebUI of FDM-Monster

Config.Name: Media
Config.Description: Temporary gcode uploads, UI bundle ZIPs, current UI bundle and logs for FDM Monster. These files are not crucial for FDM Monster to start.

Config.Name: Database Path
Config.Description: The folder in which the SQLite database files will be stored. There will be more than 1 file (usually around 3 with .sqlite and .wal extensions)

Config.Name: Experimental TYPEORM
Config.Description: Keep this enabled in order to ensure FDM Monster will be in SQLite mode. Disabling it will require a local MongoDB container on the side, which might cause your FDM Monster to stop working.
